mapper.insert: insert into member(id, email, password, name, phone_number, address, enabled, role) values (#{id}, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone_number}, null, 1, 'ROLE_USER')
insert into member(id, email, password, name, phone_number, address, enabled, role) values (#{id}, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone_number}, #{address}, 1, 'ROLE_CARCENTER')
mapper.update: update member set password=#{password} where id = #{id}
